EmailTemplate.name: IFT Invite 2007
EmailTemplate.subject: Visit Univar at IFT 2007!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Visit Univar at IFT 2007!
{!Contact.FirstName},
Need a boost? Visit our Booth! Univar will be featuring several new products with a new energy drink at Booth #2658. Come by and try a sample!
Print this invitation and bring it to our booth to receive your copy of the Univar Food Formulation tool that has the latest food industry trends and supplier food ingredient technologies to solve the most difficult formulation challenges.
Fresh Ideas start at Booth #2658! See you at IFT 2007!
ChemCare
Univar USA
Food Ingredients
Online Ordering
This email was sent to {!Contact.Email} from Univar USA Inc.
17425 NE Union Hill Rd., Redmond, WA 98052
